title: 定性香港黑警為恐怖組織，白宮聯署還差幾千，请大家帮忙联署
contents:
联署网址：https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/officially-designate-hong-kong-police-force-hkpf-terrorist-organization-and-immediately-enforce-hkhrda


Officially designate the Hong Kong Police Force (HKPF) as a Terrorist Organization and Immediately enforce HKHRDA

Created by H.T. on April 30, 2020

Since June 2019, Hong Kong Police Force (HKPF) has committed a series of violent acts, threats and crimes that target HK citizens in suppressing and violating their human rights, freedoms, democracy, safety and property for political aims. Terrible police brutality with abuse of power, force and weapons together with arbitrary or unlawful search, arrest and intrusion into citizens’ home are taken place every day in HK. Their savage acts conform to UN’s definition of terrorism which refers to ‘‘acts of violence that target civilians in the pursuit of political aims or to intimidate a population, including unlawfully and intentionally causing, attempting or threatening to cause death or serious bodily harm to civilians or noncombatants''. HKPF should be designated as terrorist organization.
